1.0.name: wordpress/appointpress-appointment-booking-calendar
1.0.description:
Appointpress is a simple yet powerful appointment booking software for your business. If your business requires appointment booking, then Appointpress is for you. If you are a consultant/doctor/lawyer/therapist etc, you can harness the power of online appointment scheduling . Simply unzip and upload appointpress-appointment-calendar directory to /wp-content/plugins/ directory and activate the plugin.

Appointpress is like you virtual receptionist which works 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and 365 days a year.
Appointpress grows with your Business. Get started with a the Forever-Free plan and upgrade only when you are ready.

Register for a free account on http://www.appointpress.com. Use shortcode [APPOINTPRESS] to insert Booking Button into any post or page. Thats it, you can now start taking appointments on your wordpress site.

If you face any problem, pls contact us via the support
